tool_description: Use Google Translate API, Same quality result but x100 cheaper. Fast and stable translation service
name: Google Translate
title: Google Translate

api_list.name: Tranlate Text

utterances.utterance: Translate 'Hello, how are you?' from English to Spanish.
Can you translate 'Bonjour tout le monde' from French to German?
Please translate 'Guten Morgen' from German to Italian.
Translate 'Buongiorno' from Italian to English.
How do you say 'Good night' in Japanese?
Translate 'Hola, ¿qué tal?' from Spanish to French.
What is the translation of 'Ciao' from Italian to Portuguese?
Translate '안녕하세요' from Korean to English.
How do you translate 'Привет' from Russian to Chinese?
Translate 'Olá, como vai você?' from Portuguese to English.

api_list.name: Detect Language

parameters.name: text
parameters.default: 感谢您使用我们的服务"

utterances.utterance: Can you detect the language of the text 'Bonjour tout le monde'?
What language is 'Hola, ¿cómo estás?' written in?
Identify the language of 'Guten Tag, wie geht es Ihnen?'

parameters.text: Guten Tag, wie geht es Ihnen?

utterances.utterance: Could you tell me the language of 'Ciao, come stai?'?
Please detect the language of 'こんにちは、お元気ですか？'

parameters.text: こんにちは、お元気ですか？

utterances.utterance: What is the language of 'Привет, как дела?'?
Can you find out the language of '안녕하세요, 어떻게 지내세요?'?
Detect the language of 'Olá, como você está?'
What language is 'Merhaba, nasılsın?'?
Identify the language of 'שלום, מה שלומך?'

api_list.name: Translate JSON

parameters.name: json
parameters.default: { 		"title": "The Importance of Regular Exercise", 		"author": "John Doe", 		"rate": 4.2999, 		"extra": { 			"comment_counts": 10, 			"last_comment": { 				"author": "not be translated", 				"short_text": "Hi thank for your post... We need more information" 			} 		} 	}
